mil5.3.4:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṃ therena sāriputtena dhammasenāpatinā parisuddhavacīsamācāro āvuso tathāgato, natthi tathāgatassa vacīduccaritaṃ, yaṃ tathāgato rakkheyya ‘mā me idaṃ paro aññāsī’ti.
mil5.3.4:5.2: Puna ca tathāgato therassa sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparādhe pārājikaṃ paññapento pharusāhi vācāhi moghapurisavādena samudācari, tena ca so thero moghapurisavādena maṅkucittavasena rundhitattā vippaṭisārī nāsakkhi ariyamaggaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ.
mil5.3.4:5.3: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, parisuddhavacīsamācāro tathāgato, natthi tathāgatassa vacīduccaritaṃ, tena hi tathāgatena therassa sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparādhe moghapurisavādena samudāciṇṇanti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā.
mil5.3.4:5.4: Yadi bhagavatā therassa sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparādhe moghapurisavādena samudāciṇṇaṃ, tena hi parisuddhavacīsamācāro tathāgato, natthi tathāgatassa vacīduccaritanti tampi vacanaṃ micchā.
mil5.3.4:5.5: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.3.4:6.2: ‘parisuddhavacīsamācāro āvuso tathāgato, natthi tathāgatassa vacīduccaritaṃ, yaṃ tathāgato rakkheyya “mā me idaṃ paro aññāsī”’ti.
mil5.3.4:6.3: Āyasmato ca sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparādhe pārājikaṃ paññapentena bhagavatā moghapurisavādena samudāciṇṇaṃ, tañca pana aduṭṭhacittena asārambhena yāthāvalakkhaṇena.
mil5.3.4:6.4: Kiñca tattha yāthāvalakkhaṇaṃ, yassa, mahārāja, puggalassa imasmiṃ attabhāve catusaccābhisamayo na hoti, tassa purisattanaṃ moghaṃ aññaṃ kayiramānaṃ aññena sambhavati, tena vuccati ‘moghapuriso’ti.
mil5.3.4:6.5: Iti, mahārāja, bhagavatā āyasmato sudinnassa kalandaputtassa sabhāvavacanena samudāciṇṇaṃ, no abhūtavādenā”ti.
mil5.3.4:7.1: “Sabhāvampi, bhante nāgasena, yo akkosanto bhaṇati, tassa mayaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dhārema, aparādhoyeva so vatthuṃ nissāya visuṃ vohāraṃ ācaranto akkosatī”ti.
mil5.3.4:7.2: “Atthi pana, mahārāja, sutapubbaṃ tayā khalitassa abhivādanaṃ vā paccuṭṭhānaṃ vā sakkāraṃ vā upāyanānuppadānaṃ vā”ti?
mil5.3.4:7.3: “Na hi, bhante, yato kutoci yattha katthaci khalito, so paribhāsanāraho hoti tajjanāraho, uttamaṅgampissa chindanti hanantipi bandhantipi ghātentipi jhāpentipī”ti.
mil5.3.4:7.4: “Tena hi, mahārāja, bhagavatā kiriyāyeva katā, no akiriyā”ti.
mil5.3.4:8.1: “Kiriyampi, bhante nāgasena, kurumānena patirūpena kātabbaṃ anucchavikena, savanenapi, bhante nāgasena, tathāgatassa sadevako loko ottappati hiriyati bhiyyo dassanena tatuttariṃ upasaṅkamanena payirupāsanenā”ti.
mil5.3.4:8.2: “Api nu kho, mahārāja, tikicchako abhisanne kāye kupite dose sinehanīyāni bhesajjāni detī”ti?
mil5.3.4:8.3: “Na hi, bhante, tiṇhāni lekhanīyāni bhesajjāni detī”ti.
mil5.3.4:8.4: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato sabbakilesabyādhivūpasamāya anusiṭṭhiṃ deti, pharusāpi, mahārāja, tathāgatassa vācā satte sinehayati, muduke karoti.
mil5.3.4:8.5: Yathā, mahārāja, uṇhampi udakaṃ yaṃ kiñci sinehanīyaṃ sinehayati, mudukaṃ karoti;
mil5.3.4:8.6: evameva kho, mahārāja, pharusāpi tathāgatassa vācā atthavatī hoti karuṇāsahagatā.
mil5.3.4:8.7: Yathā, mahārāja, pituvacanaṃ puttānaṃ atthavantaṃ hoti karuṇāsahagataṃ;
mil5.3.4:8.8: evameva kho, mahārāja, pharusāpi tathāgatassa vācā atthavatī hoti karuṇāsahagatā.
mil5.3.4:8.9: Pharusāpi, mahārāja, tathāgatassa vācā sattānaṃ kilesappahānā hoti.
mil5.3.4:8.10: Yathā, mahārāja, duggandhampi gomuttaṃ pītaṃ virasampi agadaṃ khāyitaṃ sattānaṃ byādhiṃ hanati;
mil5.3.4:8.11: evameva kho, mahārāja, pharusāpi tathāgatassa vācā atthavatī karuṇāsahagatā.
mil5.3.4:8.12: Yathā, mahārāja, mahantopi tūlapuñjo parassa kāye nipatitvā rujaṃ na karoti;
mil5.3.4:8.13: evameva kho, mahārāja, pharusāpi tathāgatassa vācā na kassaci dukkhaṃ uppādetī”ti.
mil5.3.4:8.15: Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṃ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
